Since my only available "location" to hold the research/discussion i=
n

roup in real time (and inaccessible to people who aren't signed

ber of the discussion), but I will definately post the
questions here - I'l=
l figure out a way to work it out. When it's done,

 thing, but based on prior discussion groups,
we could be looking at a doze=
n pages of text, so I'll probably put it

seem to=
 know much about them, and I try to keep the groups focused on

ecific (prior discussions have been on Kofun (burial

n).  The bakumatsu in general would be too big,
